data.eml:eml: A new genus of the tribe Parahiraciini (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Issidae) from Southern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Menglin, Bourgoin, Thierry, Zhang, Yalin (2015): A new genus of the tribe Parahiraciini (Hemiptera: Fulgoroidea: Issidae) from Southern China. Zootaxa 3957 (1): 77-84, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3957.1.6
